Post Title: 830 Crenshaw Blvd. #6 - Spacious 1be/1ba in Koreatown
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

Spacious 1 bed 1 bath located in Koreatown. Large unit with lots of natural light and airflow, large private balcony, and a kitchen equipped with a stove/oven and a refrigerator. Unit is located on the top floor the building. Water and trash utilities provided. Laundry facilities on site. 1 assigned parking space comes with unit.

Post Title: Apartment for Rent 1+1 in Koreatown!!
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

Location: 515 S Serrano Ave, Los Angeles CA 90020

Spacious 1+1 located in the center of Koreatown! Pet Friendly.. Hardwood floors throughout and A/C installed. Kitchen features tile countertops and kitchen appliances. Plenty of closet storage space. Bedroom features a walk-in closet and ceiling fan. Controlled access entry property. Laundry on site. Surrounded by coffee shops, restaurants and market places. Parking is not included.

To request a view or for more information please contact Marina show contact info or Katie show contact info

Post Title: Gated home in Koreatown! Front house 3 Beds + 2 Bath + Den Back House
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

Excellent opportunity to own a remodeled gated single-family home + Guest house in Koreatown! Front house 3 Beds + 2 Baths + bonus room/den 1,632 SF of living space on 6,901 SF lot. Open floor plan, fresh new paint, spacious living room with fireplace, formal dining room with built-ins, double pane windows, laminate floors, and recessed lights throughout. Gourmet kitchen with newer cabinets, black granite counter tops with stove, dishwasher and fridge included. Spacious laundry room. Master bedroom with private master bath. Central AC/Heating system. Backyard with fruit trees, fence, and private driveway. Guest house is approx. 600 SF with kitchen and full bathroom. 1 car garage. Automatic iron gated house with plenty of parking on driveway. Perfectly located near Larchmont Village, Hancock Park and Hollywood. House is ready to move in!
Neighborhood: (214 N Serrano Ave Los Angeles CA)

Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

Spring Move-in Special. 1 MONTH FREE on approved credit and 13-month lease.

Newly Renovated Modern Units in Echo Park/Koreatown/DTLA Adjacent Neighborhood! - Welcome to The Flynn! Units available starting at $1295.

The Flynn offers newly renovated apartments on the border of Echo Park, Koreatown and DTLA. The Flynn has a modern, clean, Scandinavian-inspired aesthetic. Our floor plans give plenty of living space and natural light. Our larger studios have a separate kitchen with plenty of room for a kitchen table and other storage.

The renovations include new vinyl plank flooring throughout, updated bathrooms and all-new kitchens featuring new counters, new cabinets, and stainless steel appliances (stove and refrigerator). Gated access will you give a level of comfort and ease of mind that you’ll quickly get used to! Our landscaped courtyard and garden will be your little oasis from the LA bustle.

FEATURES • Newly renovated • New bathroom sink, vanity, floor tiles • New flooring throughout • New light fixtures • New appliances • Select units feature in-unit laundry.

Please contact the on-site manager Jeff for a showing.

Post Title: 50-Koreatown 1 Bedroom 1 Bath ~ Wood Floors ~ Remodeled
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

A two story 36 unit garden style courtyard building with a fountain and swimming pool. Gated/intercom with surveillance cameras, laundry and gated parking. Centrally located in prime Mid-Wishire area. Close to Metro-Rail. Just south of 3rd St. Quiet building.

For more information or to schedule a viewing, please contact our Property Manager, Cesar show contact info kor at 336alexandria @ benleedsproperties.com.

KEY FEATURES
Bedrooms: 1 Bed
Bathrooms: 1 Bath
Parking: Call
Lease Duration: 1 Year (See Details Below)
Deposit: 1 month (OAC)
Pets Policy: Cats & Dogs OK
Laundry: Shared
Property Type: Apartment

Spacious living room with wall to wall wood floors, New Air Conditioner, wall heater and a Huge Window with New Vertical Blinds.

Kitchen and Dining area with lots of cabinets, stove, dishwasher, new microwave, white ceramic tile on counter tops, up to date light fixtures, linoleum floor, ceiling fan and enough space for a 4 chairs table.

Hallway with lots of closet space new light fixtures.

Guest Bedroom has hardwood floors, closet, new ceiling fan, new wall to wall mirror closet doors and big window with new vertical blind.

Bathroom with linoleum floor, new light fixture, white ceramic tile on sink counter top and walls around a cast iron bath tub.

Large Master Bedroom has wood floors, new ceiling fan and big window with new vertical blind and wall to wall closet with mirror doors.

1 Assigned parking spaces*


For additional Ben Leeds Property listings go to www.benleedsproperties.com or call our Leasing Agent show contact info .

Pet Policy:
Cat and Dogs friendly – under 25 lbs. (weight at maturity); No aggressive breeds: Chows, Pit Bulls, Dobermans, Rottweilers, German Shepard, and a mix of aggressive breeds.

Other Terms and Requirements:
1-year lease term; Security deposit is determined by your credit, typically 1-month rent; Online Application is preferred and can be processed faster than a paper application; $30 Application fee per person (18 years and older) can be paid with credit or debit card for online application or with money order and cashier check for paper application; No evictions; No foreclosures / bankruptcies in the last 5 years; Two (2) forms of current government issued ID: Driver’s License, Passport, SSN card, Military ID, Visa, etc; Proof of Income: last 3 months of check stub’s, or checking / saving account, or current W2. Renter’s insurance is required.

Equal Housing Opportunity Provider

*Pricing and availability is subject to change without notice*

Bright, spacious one bedroom / one bathroom apartment for rent in Koreatown (Hancock Park adjacent). Unit includes two private balconies, hardwood-look flooring, stainless steel Frigidaire refrigerator and stove, and ample storage (three closets plus built-in hallway cabinets). On-site laundry facilities. Comes with one parking space in secured garage. Landlord-paid utilities include water and trash.

Building is located on a tree-lined street minutes from Silverlake, Echo Park, Los Feliz, Downtown, Hollywood, Mid-City, Fairfax District (see map for exact location). Walking distance to Wiltern Theater, Ralphs, The Mercury Shops, Metro Purple Line (Wilshire & Western station), cafes, restaurants, bars, movie theater, and more.

Walk score of 93 (walker's paradise). Transit score of 76 (excellent transit).

$1,595 monthly rental rate based on one-year lease. Move-in available immediately. No pets. No smokers. No exceptions.

(1) Full name
(2) Cell phone number
(3) General hours of availability

Post Title: ☑Newer 1 Bedroom in Koreatown Adj ^ Fridge ^ Hardwood Floors ^ A/C☑
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

Not all apartment communities are created equal. To stand out in a highly competitive field, there are two factors a successful community needs to focus on. First, they need to offer amenities that, quite simply, you can't live without. Second, the community needs to be located somewhere desirable. So what makes Valley Street Apartments special?

When you come home to Valley St. Apartments, you'll enjoy a place that's designed with comfort, convenience, and functionality in mind. Assigned parking spaces means that the days of endlessly hunting for a place to park are over. You'll see that hardwood flooring and a suite of kitchen appliances allow you to experience the convenience and comfort of modern living. Our fitness center lets you stay active no matter the weather, and on-site laundry facilities reduce the annoyance of that one chore.

You'll find us between the popular neighborhoods of Echo Park and Silver Lake. Our community offers many parks, shopping options, historic Los Angeles landmarks, and so much more. And with access to the wider world through easy freeway access and convenient commuter rail stations, exploring your new neighborhood has never been easier.

Maybe this sounds perfect for you and your family and you're ready to join us, making here your next home. If so, you'll want to act fast, because our apartments won't last long and demand is high. Contact us online or by phone today.

Post Title: 1 Bedroom in Koreatown Adj | Fitness Center | Newly Built
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

Not all apartment communities are created equal. To stand out in a highly competitive field, there are two factors a successful community needs to focus on. First, they need to offer amenities that, quite simply, you can't live without. Second, the community needs to be located somewhere desirable. So what makes Valley Street Apartments special?
When you come home to Valley St. Apartments, you'll enjoy a place that's designed with comfort, convenience, and functionality in mind. Assigned parking spaces means that the days of endlessly hunting for a place to park are over. You'll see that hardwood flooring and a suite of kitchen appliances allow you to experience the convenience and comfort of modern living. Our fitness center lets you stay active no matter the weather, and on-site laundry facilities reduce the annoyance of that one chore.

You'll find us between the popular neighborhoods of Echo Park and Silver Lake. Our community offers many parks, shopping options, historic Los Angeles landmarks, and so much more. And with access to the wider world through easy freeway access and convenient commuter rail stations, exploring your new neighborhood has never been easier.

Maybe this sounds perfect for you and your family and you're ready to join us, making here your next home. If so, you'll want to act fast, because our apartments won't last long and demand is high. Contact us online or by phone today.

Not all apartment communities are created equal. To stand out in a highly competitive field, there are two factors a successful community needs to focus on. First, they need to offer amenities that, quite simply, you can't live without. Second, the community needs to be located somewhere desirable. So what makes Valley Street Apartments special?

When you come home to Valley St. Apartments, you'll enjoy a place that's designed with comfort, convenience, and functionality in mind. Assigned parking spaces means that the days of endlessly hunting for a place to park are over. You'll see that hardwood flooring and a suite of kitchen appliances allow you to experience the convenience and comfort of modern living. Our fitness center lets you stay active no matter the weather, and on-site laundry facilities reduce the annoyance of that one chore.

You'll find us between the popular neighborhoods of Echo Park and Silver Lake. Our community offers many parks, shopping options, historic Los Angeles landmarks, and so much more. And with access to the wider world through easy freeway access and convenient commuter rail stations, exploring your new neighborhood has never been easier.

Maybe this sounds perfect for you and your family and you're ready to join us, making here your next home. If so, you'll want to act fast, because our apartments won't last long and demand is high. Contact us online or by phone today.

Post Title: 1 Bedroom in Koreatown Adj + Newly Built + Gym + Wood Style Floors
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

Not all apartment communities are created equal. To stand out in a highly competitive field, there are two factors a successful community needs to focus on. First, they need to offer amenities that, quite simply, you can't live without. Second, the community needs to be located somewhere desirable. So what makes Valley Street Apartments special?
When you come home to Valley St. Apartments, you'll enjoy a place that's designed with comfort, convenience, and functionality in mind. Assigned parking spaces means that the days of endlessly hunting for a place to park are over. You'll see that hardwood flooring and a suite of kitchen appliances allow you to experience the convenience and comfort of modern living. Our fitness center lets you stay active no matter the weather, and on-site laundry facilities reduce the annoyance of that one chore.

You'll find us between the popular neighborhoods of Echo Park and Silver Lake. Our community offers many parks, shopping options, historic Los Angeles landmarks, and so much more. And with access to the wider world through easy freeway access and convenient commuter rail stations, exploring your new neighborhood has never been easier.

Maybe this sounds perfect for you and your family and you're ready to join us, making here your next home. If so, you'll want to act fast, because our apartments won't last long and demand is high. Contact us online or by phone today.

Not all apartment communities are created equal. To stand out in a highly competitive field, there are two factors a successful community needs to focus on. First, they need to offer amenities that, quite simply, you can't live without. Second, the community needs to be located somewhere desirable. So what makes Valley Street Apartments special?

When you come home to Valley St. Apartments, you'll enjoy a place that's designed with comfort, convenience, and functionality in mind. Assigned parking spaces means that the days of endlessly hunting for a place to park are over. You'll see that hardwood flooring and a suite of kitchen appliances allow you to experience the convenience and comfort of modern living. Our fitness center lets you stay active no matter the weather, and on-site laundry facilities reduce the annoyance of that one chore.

You'll find us between the popular neighborhoods of Echo Park and Silver Lake. Our community offers many parks, shopping options, historic Los Angeles landmarks, and so much more. And with access to the wider world through easy freeway access and convenient commuter rail stations, exploring your new neighborhood has never been easier.

Maybe this sounds perfect for you and your family and you're ready to join us, making here your next home. If so, you'll want to act fast, because our apartments won't last long and demand is high. Contact us online or by phone today.

Post Title: Furnished Generous Koreatown 2BR w/ Gym, Pool, walk to Wilshire
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

Avoid all the hassles of renting unfurnished by opting for our move-in ready, furnished apartments for flexible stays of a month, year or even longer.

We offer custom pricing for any duration. Rates may vary upon exact move in and move out dates.

Book now the lowest rate for a 12+ months lease at $3,400 / mo.

Indicative prices/duration:
6 months lease: from $3,710 / mo
3 months lease: from $3,940 / mo
2 months lease: from $4,130 / mo
1 month lease: from $4,170 / mo

*Prices quoted are: (1) based on moving in the first day the unit becomes available, (2) applicable only if billed upfront; can be higher if billed in multiple payments, and (3) exclusive of any taxes or utilities.

Follow the link to book online!
https://www.theblueground.com/furnished-apartments-los-angeles-usa/central-la-koreatown-332?utm_source=classified-8

Discover the best of Los Angeles, with this two-bedroom Koreatown
apartment.
It’ll be easy to simply show up and start living in this lavishly Blueground furnished apartment with its
fully-equipped kitchen, lovely living room, and our dedicated, on-the-ground support. (ID #LAX332)

Designed With You In Mind

Gorgeous furniture, fully-equipped kitchen, smart TV, and a premium wireless speaker are just a few of the amenities
you’ll find inside this two-bedroom apartment. Ideally located in Los Angeles, you’ll find a lot to love outside
as well. When you’re ready to relax, you’ll be happy to discover every Blueground bedroom comes with superior quality
mattresses, luxury linens, and cozy towels. We handle everything so you can simply show up and start
living. This apartment also offers in-apartment laundry.


Sleeping Arrangements

King Bed, 70.8in/180cm
Queen Bed, 63in/160cm


Amenities

Building amenities unique to this two-bedroom apartment include an on-site:

- Pet Friendly
- Dog Park/Run
- Swimming Pool
- Gym
- Outdoor Parking
- Roof Deck
- Garden

- Elevator

Arrival and ongoing support

The entire apartment is yours to enjoy! You’ll either be personally greeted by a Blueground team member or given self check-in instructions.
Throughout your stay, you’ll have access to our Client Experience team around the clock through the Blueground App. You can schedule additional cleanings, submit maintenance requests, and view our neighborhood recommendations with just a few taps.
We’ll share all details upon confirmation of your stay.

Ideally Located

This lovely furnished rental is located in Koreatown, a trendy LA neighborhood with amazing proximity and much to offer. With a central location, Hollywood, Mid-Wilshire, and DTLA are only 15 mins away. Koreatown has transformed to a co-mingling, vibrant city of diverse young professionals. You certainly won’t have trouble finding a bite to eat or a place to relax at the end of the evening with hip bars and restaurants in the neighborhood. The area's multiple Metro stops makes hopping between Koreatown's attractions all the easier from Western to Vermont, and Beverly to Olympic.

A Few Things To Note



This Blueground apartment can be booked for a minimum of one month, to a year or more.
Pets are welcome, though weight limits and breed restrictions apply and may incur fees.

Parking is offered based on availability and is subject to a fee.


As guidelines evolve around COVID-19, certain community amenities may have temporarily restricted access and our prices are updated to reflect this.
We take great pride in ensuring every photo displayed is shot in our own apartments with our actual furnishings. That said, we regularly refresh our decor and furniture arrangement, which may differ from what’s pictured.

Post Title: Clean and Spacious 2-Bedroom Condo in Koreatown
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

Newer, clean and spacious 2-bedroom, 2-bath condo unit for rent. Unit is located in a quiet complex with central courtyard. Open floor plan that flows fluidly from kitchen to dining to living room. Large kitchen has light-colored cabinetry, stainless steel finished appliances (gas stove, oven, microwave, dishwasher, refrigerator), granite counter top and breakfast counter. Dining and living room have engineered hardwood flooring. Living room has double pane sliding door leading to private balcony with laundry closet. Stacked washer and dryer included. Master bedroom has large walk-in closet, a private balcony and a huge master's bathroom. Newer laminated hardwood flooring in both bedrooms. Two (2) on-site assigned tandem parking spaces in secure, gated subterranean parking. Unit has an additional private storage in garage level. Conveniently located with a short drive to Downtown LA and close to Koreatown, metro station, on-off ramp to Fwy 101, markets, restaurants, shopping centers, bus stops and more.

* 2 Bedrooms
* 2 Full Bathroom
* Spacious Living Area: Approx. 1,310 SF
* 2-car on-site secure gated subterranean parking spaces (tandem)
* Kitchen with bright light-colored cabinetry (ample storage), stainless steel appliances (refrigerator included)
* Engineered hardwood in kitchen, dining and living room
* Newer Laminated Hardwood Floor in Bedrooms
* Two Private Balconies
* In-Unit Stacked Washer and Dryer (washer and dry included)
* Private Storage Room in garage level
* Elevator equipped building
* Quiet complex with Central Courtyard
* Utilities Included with Rent: HOA dues, water, gas, trash
* Available: Immediately

Requirements, Terms and Restrictions:
* Minimum One (1) Year Lease
* Monthly Rent: $2,700
* Security Deposit: $3,000
* Keys Deposit: $100
* HOA Non-Refundable Move-In/Move-Out Fee: $200
* Credit Reports required from all applicants and subject to Landlord's approval
* No Pet(s)
* No Sub-leasing / House Sharing
* No Smoking

For additional information or appointment to view interior, please call: show contact info

Information courtesy of Tendwell Realty & Investment, Inc.
All information deemed reliable but not guaranteed.

Address: 2320 39th Street, Los Angeles, 90008


About this unit:
Spacious 2 Bedrooms, large den/dining room ,1 Bathroom duplex newly remodeled, within close range of USC. This apartment has hardwood flooring throughout, with brand new quartz counter tops, with a calacatta backsplash and shaker cabinets. This unit has stainless steel appliances including a stove, large dishwasher, huge double door fridge, and contemporary stove hood. It also includes a separate utility room that contains washer and dryer; new bathroom vanity, and LED track lighting. Air conditioning is also provided in each bedroom. Unit has a privatized large gated patio area with new patio furniture perfect for your barbecue, is newly landscaped for environmental conservation, and includes 2 tandem parking spots, including one in a garage.

Located in the heart of Liemert Park less than 1 mile from the Expo Line and only 2 miles from USC. There is also a separate work/storage room for artistic creatives.


Featured amenities:
- Stainless Steel Fridge
- Range, Oven & Designer Hood

- Cats allowed

About Ownership and Management: Palmer Properties is a 55 year old company and was the developer of the property. Julie has been the manager for over 15 years and Jose has been the maintenance engineer for over 12 years. Both Julie and Jose have a lot of pride in maintaining the properties and servicing our clients. Palmer, Julie and Jose continue to improve and adapt to make the apartment living (and now your work from home) experience as safe and enjoyable as possible during these unusual times.

Post Title: 1BR / Reno'd Kitchen, Large Living Space, Bedroom
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

Reno'd Kitchen, Large Living Space, Top Floor One Bedroom in Heart of Koreatown

Property Address
407 S Kenmore Ave | Los Angeles, CA 90020
Available: Now

Offered By
Urban L.A. Living


Description
THE ONE BEDROOM APARTMENT measures about 650 square feet. A large living space welcomes you with an eat-in kitchen area for comfortable socializing. Your bedroom is about 12x12 and is large enough for any size bed you desire, along with small day-to-day closet, as well as a larger closet in the hallway for all your storage needs. The bathroom has a decorative pedestal sink, and brand new tiles. All throughout, we've done our best to retain the buildings original 1920s ambience, and giving you a comfortable space to call home.

THE BUILDING has laundry facilities on the premises. A shared backyard space for lounging, and multiple monthly parking garages in the area, so your car is easy to park and only a short walk away, if you choose to have one. Our area is so walkable, convenient and close to public transit, that not having a car isn't a deal breaker.

THE AREA is walking distance from great Koreatown locations: 2 blocks from Chapman Plaza, Blue Bottle Coffee, Brothers Sandwich Shop, EMC Seafood & Raw Bar, famous Cassell's Hamburgers, The Normandie Club, The Walker Inn, Break Room 86, The LINE Hotel, and some of the best Abalone Porridge and Korean Chicken Soup in the area at Mountain Cafe. As well as a neverending list of other cafes/bars, restaurants and businesses, and grocery stores.

We're close to USC, a 10 minute walk from 2 metro's (Wilshire/Normandie & Wilshire/Western) and 10 minutes in a car from 2 freeway entrances as well.

IT IS AVAILABLE NOW with a one year lease, credit/background check. WILL ACCEPT GOOD CREDIT ONLY.

  • Exposed Brick Walls
  • Walking Distance To Restaurants
  • Laundry On-Site

Post Title: Guesthouse - Utilities Included / One Parking
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

One bedroom, one bath guesthouse is available for rent for $1,200 per month. A minimum of six month lease and a security deposit of $1,200 are required.

The guesthouse is roughly 250 square feet and located behind the main house. It comes with a refrigerator, wall heater and hardwood floors.

There is no kitchen inside the unit but you may use the kitchen in the main house for cooking.

All the utilities (power, natural gas, water) and Wi-Fi are included with the rent. The house is located about 2 miles west of the USC campus and south of Koreatown.

There is an off-street parking available for $50 per month. And there is free washer and dryer on site.

The unit will be available on June 1st. This is a 420-friendly house.

NO PETS PLEASE.

Not all apartment communities are created equal. To stand out in a highly competitive field, there are two factors a successful community needs to focus on. First, they need to offer amenities that, quite simply, you can't live without. Second, the community needs to be located somewhere desirable. So what makes Valley Street Apartments special?

When you come home to Valley St. Apartments, you'll enjoy a place that's designed with comfort, convenience, and functionality in mind. Assigned parking spaces means that the days of endlessly hunting for a place to park are over. You'll see that hardwood flooring and a suite of kitchen appliances allow you to experience the convenience and comfort of modern living. Our fitness center lets you stay active no matter the weather, and on-site laundry facilities reduce the annoyance of that one chore.

You'll find us between the popular neighborhoods of Echo Park and Silver Lake. Our community offers many parks, shopping options, historic Los Angeles landmarks, and so much more. And with access to the wider world through easy freeway access and convenient commuter rail stations, exploring your new neighborhood has never been easier.

Perfectly located to enjoy the benefits of urban living, while maintaining the charm of a quiet Hollywood neighborhood. Home to picturesque Art Deco era architecture, Koreatown is an awesome neighborhood located in central Los Angeles. The swanky district starts just south of Hollywood’s Paramount Studios and is framed by popular landmarks such as the La Brea Tar Pits, LACMA, and Wilshire GolfCourse. Known as a family-friendly neighborhood home to several celebrities such as Shonda Rhimes, Mindy Kaling, and Nate Berkus, it is filled with quiet tree-lined streets, boutique shops, and intimate eateries. Koreatown is easily accessible to West Hollywood, Downtown, San Fernando Valley and the beaches.

Post Title: 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath Guesthouse (Utilities Included - One Parking)
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

One bedroom, one bath guesthouse is available for rent for $1,200 per month. A minimum of six month lease and a security deposit of $1,200 are required.

The guesthouse is roughly 250 square feet and located behind the main house. It comes with a refrigerator, wall heater and hardwood floors.

There is no kitchen inside the unit but you may use the kitchen in the main house for cooking.

All the utilities (power, natural gas, water) and Wi-Fi are included with the rent. The house is located about 2 miles west of the USC campus and south of Koreatown.

There is an off-street parking available for $50 per month. And there is free washer and dryer on site.

The unit will be available on June 1st. This is a 420-friendly house.

NO PETS PLEASE.

Ultimately, home is all about the details. For an apartment home to be unique, it needs more than just a reasonable amount of living space; it needs amenities that enrich your life, in a place that enhances your experiences. At Grandview Towers, those details are our priority.

As you explore your new apartment home, you'll notice a wide variety of thoughtful amenities. Look up and you'll see soaring vaulted ceilings, which create a feeling of space. Look down and you'll see immaculate hardwood and tile flooring. Run your hand along smooth granite countertops, and your eye can't help but wander to stainless steel appliances.

Just steps away lies our fitness center, providing plenty of opportunities to help sustain your busy lifestyle. Look a little further at immaculately kept landscaping, where you can mingle and meet new friends and old. Look further yet, and you'll see you're surrounded by the diverse and laid-back community of Westlake. Parks, restaurants, and museums are available, and you're less than two minutes from downtown Los Angeles.

Home is all about the details. If you're ready to take advantage of them, we're ready to have you. For more information about leasing, contact us online or by phone today.

Post Title: Private Room for rent in my Loft Style Apt
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

Hi everyone. Looking for a new roommate for my one bedroom with a loft. I live upstairs in my open loft next to the 2nd story balcony. The bedroom is private with it's own bathroom, but it is unfurnished. My stove, fridge, and microwave can be shared and I will be paying for all utility bills. Rent will be $1000, but I may be willing to lower it (slightly).

Little about me, I am a poc, lgbt friendly, and extremely friendly (can be opinionated though). I try to live by the 3 "C's" (cool, calm, and collected :-) . I work in the entertainment field, but jobs have been slow in the last year. When I start back I likely will be working from home again, so I will be their most of the time. Looking for a chill person, that keeps the common areas clean, don't have many guests, and has no kids (sorry bad experience with a roomy). I prefer someone in their 20's and 30's, but definitely open to older or younger.

A credit check and application are required by the property management, so please be prepared. If you have any more questions feel free to ask me at the provided number (text only) or email. I will only be accepting text and emails until we see if we're a match. Thanks for reading the ad and hope it wasn't to long :-)

Post Title: Guesthouse - Utilities Included / One Parking
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

One bedroom, one bath guesthouse is available for rent for $1,200 per month. A minimum of six month lease and a security deposit of $1,200 are required.

The guesthouse is roughly 250 square feet and located behind the main house. It comes with a refrigerator, wall heater and hardwood floors.

There is no kitchen inside the unit but you may use the kitchen in the main house for cooking.

All the utilities (power, natural gas, water) and Wi-Fi are included with the rent. The house is located about 2 miles west of the USC campus and south of Koreatown.

There is an off-street parking available for $50 per month. And there is free washer and dryer on site.

The unit will be available on June 1st. This is a 420-friendly house.

NO PETS PLEASE.

Ultimately, home is all about the details. For an apartment home to be unique, it needs more than just a reasonable amount of living space; it needs amenities that enrich your life, in a place that enhances your experiences. At Grandview Towers, those details are our priority.

As you explore your new apartment home, you'll notice a wide variety of thoughtful amenities. Look up and you'll see soaring vaulted ceilings, which create a feeling of space. Look down and you'll see immaculate hardwood and tile flooring. Run your hand along smooth granite countertops, and your eye can't help but wander to stainless steel appliances.

Just steps away lies our fitness center, providing plenty of opportunities to help sustain your busy lifestyle. Look a little further at immaculately kept landscaping, where you can mingle and meet new friends and old. Look further yet, and you'll see you're surrounded by the diverse and laid-back community of Westlake. Parks, restaurants, and museums are available, and you're less than two minutes from downtown Los Angeles.

Home is all about the details. If you're ready to take advantage of them, we're ready to have you. For more information about leasing, contact us online or by phone today.

Description
Move in Special...One Month Free..Inquire with Office for Details. This 4-unit updated complex is minutes away from Hancock Park, Silver Lake and Mid-Wilshire. Located on the upper level with a bird’s eye view of the neighborhood, this vibrant apartment is a must see. The entire apartment has been redone with top of the line finishings. There are beautiful hardwood floors throughout. The large living room has a built-in mantle great for displaying your photos or artwork and a bonus room directly next to the living room that can be used as a small office. It opens out to the kitchen which is fully equipped with a stove, fridge, microwave, dishwasher. Just off the kitchen is a pantry with a built-in china cabinet. As you walk down the long hallway, you’ll find a built-in linen closet, bathroom with a combination shower and deep soak tub, laundry room and a stackable washer and dryer. The large master bedroom features and en-suite bathroom with a stand-alone shower. The other bedrooms are nicely sized with ample closet space and ceiling fans. At the rear of the property, you’ll find a private 1-car garage. This fourplex is centrally located and minutes to the 101 freeway, metro train station, authentic restaurants, shopping and much much more!

Post Title: 2-Bedroom/2 Bath Apartment in Los Feliz! Move in July 1
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

LOS FELIZ SUBLET - Partially furnished, spacious two bedroom-one fully furnished, two bathroom, large living room-with couch, dining room, kitchen, funky balcony w/plants, hardwood floors, in a safe gated building on a quiet “speed bumped” street in the ultra-hip Los Feliz neighborhood available for a minimum 1 year sublet (July 2021-July 2022). Amenities include one covered parking space inside condo complex, laundry in building, oversize bathtub, 52-inch LED TV, DVDs, and library, ask about the furniture. SORRY, NO PETS. NO CIGARETTE SMOKERS.

Live 3 blocks from all the action, Los Feliz Village (Vermont, Hillhurst & Hollywood Blvd are the main streets) with movies, restaurants, bars, coffee houses, shops, banks, grocery stores; you name it. You will be live just blocks away from The House of Pies (Quentin Tarantino and Charlie Kaufman wrote screenplays here), the Dresden (Swingers & Lalaland), historic VISTA movie theatre, Thai Town (Jitlada, one of Jonathan Gold’s favorite restaurants), and a short Uber ride to The Greek Theatre and Dodger Stadium. Post Title: Beautiful 2 bdrm, split level, parking!
Description:

Beautiful 2 bdrm, split level, parking!

Centered between thriving Koreatown and teeming Hollywood, this quieter East Hollywood neighborhood is known for lower rents, diversity and interesting eateries that offer new experiences and convenience.

This apartment is situated on a quiet side street close to Los Angles City College, Barnsdall Art Park and three large hospitals. Access to freeways and major thoroughfares is a breeze, and you can arrive in Downtown Los Angeles within minutes.

With a Walk Score of 86 out of 100, this location is "Very Walk-able" so most errands can be accomplished on foot. Just minutes from the Metro Red Line (Vermont & Santa Monica Station) and other public transportation lines makes this area very desirable.

This 1950's apartment, with it's charm and comfort, is a split level unit which means there is no one living above you - bedrooms and bathroom above, living and kitchen area below! Nearly new appliances included (stove and refrigerator), garbage disposal, washer/dryer hookups, large closets, linen closet, storage closet, brand new light fixtures, gated parking and access to the backyard and side-yard grassy areas.

Charming Duplex with Driveway Parking and Private Patio at the border of West Hollywood

7281 Fountain Ave, Los Angeles CA 90046

Take a step back in time to this 'Roaring 1920s ' bungalow. Beautifully remodeled to meet the market's demand of style and aesthetics while maintaining the 1920's charm with its beautiful archways throughout. Conveniently located at the border of West Hollywood - just steps away from the Plummer park, local coffee shops, restaurants and grocery stores.

This home features a cozy master bedroom and compact second bedroom with a walk-in closet can be used as an office, walk-in closet, library, guest room - you name it. In addition, you can access the private outdoor patio from the second room. The wonderfully updated eat-in kitchen is equipped with stainless steel appliances such as a fridge, dishwasher, stove, microwave and gorgeous backsplash to make this kitchen pop.  And the home comes with a driveway that can fit one car plus central AC and heat. The private outdoor patio sits outside of the second bedroom ideal to entertain guests and simply enjoy the So Cal weather all day long.  Only two units side by side - small and friendly community. No onsite laundry. Call, text or email to set up a viewing.

Post Title: DEPOSIT FREE and 1 MONTH FREE Newly Renovated Unit
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

Welcome to THE Alex!

**1 Free Month

**Ask us about DEPOSIT FREE Living with Rhino!!**

The $2,154 advertised rent is the Effective Rent, not the Lease Rent. It's based on a Lease Rent of $2,350 and 4 weeks of free rent over a 12 month lease term. The actual lease rent is $2,350, but the 2nd month would be free! So the effective rent would is $2,154 based on a 12 month term of $2,350 with the 2nd month free.

Cushioned in the heart of trendy Hollywood, Los Angeles, THE Alex offers newly renovated luxury rental apartments with eloquent and thoughtful details throughout. You will be happy to call THE Alex your new home. It offers tenants bright and spacious units featuring living arrangements complete with designer touches, hand-crafted details and modern conveniences such as in-unit laundry, modern designs and gated, secure parking. Open floor plans and large windows offering plenty of natural light give a fresh, clean Scandinavian-inspired aesthetic. THE Alex offers you a unique combination of modern living and relaxed comfort, while being centrally located in one of the most engaging and diverse neighborhoods in Los Angeles.

Visit TheAlexOnRosewood.com for more details including photos and unit floor plans!
Email through this ad or Call/text show contact info


The apartments at THE Alex have been completely renovated: All-new kitchens with stone counters, brand new stainless-steel appliances including dishwasher, your own personal in-unit washer and dryer, new bathrooms w tile flooring, and designer finishes throughout. Living area with wood floors, large window with vertical blinds and air conditioner on the wall.

Kitchen is open-concept and has nice linoleum flooring, lots of white upper and lower cabinets, nice and spacious counters, all white appliances including a 30" white gas stove/oven, dishwasher and over the range microwave.

Bathroom has nice linoleum flooring, dark wood vanity with mirrored medicine cabinet, white bathtub with custom tile on the walls and curved shower rod with curtain.

Master Bedroom with wood floors, two closets with sliding mirrored doors, and a large window with vertical blinds.

Master Bathroom has wood vanity with a mirror and lights above, and a standing shower with custom tile walls.

Second Bedroom with wood floors, wood closet, and a window with vertical blinds.

Unit comes with 1 dedicated parking space.

Cat and Dogs friendly – under 25 lbs. (weight at maturity); No aggressive breeds: Chows, Pit Bulls, Dobermans, Rottweilers, German Shepard, and a mix of aggressive breeds. Pet Rent and Deposit may apply.

1-year lease term; Security deposit is determined by your credit, typically 1-month rent; Online Application is preferred and can be processed faster than a paper application; $30 Application fee per person (18 years and older) can be paid with credit or debit card for online application or with money order and cashier check for paper application; No evictions; No foreclosures / bankruptcies in the last 5 years; Two (2) forms of current government issued ID: Driver’s License, Passport, SSN card, Military ID, Visa, etc; Proof of Income: last 3 months of check stub’s, or checking / saving account, or current W2. Renter’s insurance is required.

Post Title: Guesthouse - Utilities Included / One Parking
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

One bedroom, one bath guesthouse is available for rent for $1,200 per month. A minimum of six month lease and a security deposit of $1,200 are required.

The guesthouse is roughly 250 square feet and located behind the main house. It comes with a refrigerator, wall heater and hardwood floors.

There is no kitchen inside the unit but you may use the kitchen in the main house for cooking.

All the utilities (power, natural gas, water) and Wi-Fi are included with the rent. The house is located about 2 miles west of the USC campus and south of Koreatown.

There is an off-street parking available for $50 per month. And there is free washer and dryer on site.

The unit will be available on June 1st. This is a 420-friendly house.

NO PETS PLEASE.

Description:

Unit Availability : June 05, 2021

Ultimately, home is all about the details. For an apartment home to be unique, it needs more than just a reasonable amount of living space; it needs amenities that enrich your life, in a place that enhances your experiences. At Grandview Towers, those details are our priority.

As you explore your new apartment home, you'll notice a wide variety of thoughtful amenities. Look up and you'll see soaring vaulted ceilings, which create a feeling of space. Look down and you'll see immaculate hardwood and tile flooring. Run your hand along smooth granite countertops, and your eye can't help but wander to stainless steel appliances.

Just steps away lies our fitness center, providing plenty of opportunities to help sustain your busy lifestyle. Look a little further at immaculately kept landscaping, where you can mingle and meet new friends and old. Look further yet, and you'll see you're surrounded by the diverse and laid-back community of Westlake. Parks, restaurants, and museums are available, and you're less than two minutes from downtown Los Angeles.

Home is all about the details. If you're ready to take advantage of them, we're ready to have you. For more information about leasing, contact us online or by phone today.

Cushioned in the heart of trendy Hollywood, Los Angeles, THE Alex offers newly renovated luxury rental apartments with eloquent and thoughtful details throughout. You will be happy to call THE Alex your new home. It offers tenants bright and spacious units featuring living arrangements complete with designer touches, hand-crafted details and modern conveniences such as in-unit laundry, modern designs and gated, secure parking. Open floor plans and large windows offering plenty of natural light give a fresh, clean Scandinavian-inspired aesthetic. THE Alex offers you a unique combination of modern living and relaxed comfort, while being centrally located in one of the most engaging and diverse neighborhoods in Los Angeles.

Visit TheAlexOnRosewood.com for more details including photos and unit floor plans!

***Contact Justin at show contact info ***

The apartments at THE Alex have been completely renovated: All-new kitchens with stone counters, brand new stainless-steel appliances including dishwasher, your own personal in-unit washer and dryer, new bathrooms w tile flooring, and designer finishes throughout. No detail, no matter how small, has been overlooked with new cabinets, windows and interior light fixtures to help you feel at home.


THE Alex is nestled at the nexus of vibrant and trendy neighborhoods of Larchmont Village, Hancock Park, Hollywood, and Koreatown. Within walking distance is the Vermont/Beverly Metro Station for easy access to car-free travel. Locally, there are dozens of authentic restaurants, chill bars and shops at your fingertips: Everything on Larchmont (Café Gratitude, Salt & Straw artisan ice cream, Pressed Juicery), Pour Vous and Osteria La Buca / Mamma on Melrose, too many excellent Korean BBQ places in Koreatown to mention. Easy travel to Downtown L.A., Culver City, Beverly Hills or West Hollywood.

• Fully renovated throughout
• Open concept floorplans

Post Title: Newly Built 2 Bedroom | Korea Town Adj. | Cable Internet Phone Ready
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

Unit Availability : June 05, 2021

Ultimately, home is all about the details. For an apartment home to be unique, it needs more than just a reasonable amount of living space; it needs amenities that enrich your life, in a place that enhances your experiences. At Grandview Towers, those details are our priority.

As you explore your new apartment home, you'll notice a wide variety of thoughtful amenities. Look up and you'll see soaring vaulted ceilings, which create a feeling of space. Look down and you'll see immaculate hardwood and tile flooring. Run your hand along smooth granite countertops, and your eye can't help but wander to stainless steel appliances.

Just steps away lies our fitness center, providing plenty of opportunities to help sustain your busy lifestyle. Look a little further at immaculately kept landscaping, where you can mingle and meet new friends and old. Look further yet, and you'll see you're surrounded by the diverse and laid-back community of Westlake. Parks, restaurants, and museums are available, and you're less than two minutes from downtown Los Angeles.

Home is all about the details. If you're ready to take advantage of them, we're ready to have you. For more information about leasing, contact us online or by phone today.


show contact info
www.thegrandviewtowers.com

- Private Balconies

- Generous Walk-in Closets

Wilshire Royale is a unique asset in a vibrant area of Los Angeles, between Mid-Wilshire/Koreatown and East Downtown. Originally constructed in 1927 as the Arcady Apartment Hotel, Wilshire Royale is part of MWest's Heritage Collection. MWest has maintained the building's 1920s architecture and neoclassical style. Post Title: Master Bedroom in Brand New Top Floor 2b2b Furnished Apartment
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

AVAILABLE NOW! Master bedroom in a furnished two bed, two bath apartment on the top floor of a brand new four-story complex between Larchmont and Koreatown. Unit comes with:

• Full balcony
• In-unit washer and dryer
• Two covered parking garage spaces (no tandem, you'll get your own space)
• Super fast wifi (400mbps/20mbps)
• Forced air heating and AC
• Gas range stove
• Dishwasher
• Recessed lighting
• Big windows and a breathtaking view of the Hollywood Sign and Griffith Observatory.

The master bedroom comes with:

• Full private bathroom
• Huge walk-in closet
• Recessed lighting
• Ethernet port

The complex was built last year, so it's brand new. They're putting in a two-story gym and adding chairs and grills to the rooftop with an incredible view. The building is located in a nice, safe, quiet neighborhood and just a four minute drive from Larchmont Blvd, Koreatown, and the 101.

About me: I'll be your roommate living in the other bedroom. Male (he/him/his), late 20s, grad student at USC School of Cinematic Arts and working part-time in the film industry, extremely clean and quiet, usually out and about, either on set, at school, or galavanting around LA, photographer and gardener (obviously, I mean look at those plants), non-smoker, respectful of your space and belongings, always down to hangout and grab a drink!

Who I'm looking for: Working professional, 25-40, and CLEAN! Truly not asking for the world, just that you don't leave dishes in the sink and mop the floor occasionally. You know, basic adulting stuff. That you're respectfully quiet (eg not blasting music at odd hours of the night). That you don't smoke (the infrequent hard-day-at-work balcony joint accepted, I'm not a monster), and no pets please.

Rent is $1825 plus utilities and deposit is $540. Looking for a long-term roomie who can stick around for at least a year. You'll need to submit a rental application for approval.

If you're interested, please email me with "NEW ROOMIE INTERESTED" in the subject so that I know you read all this wonderful info and include your Instagram or Facebook handle. I'd love to chat with you on Zoom and maybe set up a visit if you want! I'm fully vaccinated!

-Brian

Post Title: French Normandie w/Concrete Floors..Gorgeous Studio..MOVE IN SPECIAL!
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

In 1929, workaholic-genius architect Leland Bryant designed this French Norman Revival-style apartment building known as the St. Germaine. This is truly a unique building in the Mid-Wilshire and Koreatown area! This building is made for residents who appreciate the finer things in life. We now have available a beautiful 1920's French Normandie Style single. This unique single is ample with 700 sq. ft., vaulted ceilings, custom color paint, crown molding, concrete floors, and plenty of natural sunlights. Included in this unit you have a vanity area, plenty of closets with lots of space for storage. Kitchen comes with a stove, granite counters with a beautiful light fixture over the dining area. Post Title: Farmers Market Self Storage: The Best In Town!
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

Greetings to you, storage-unit shopper... thank you for looking at our ad!
Come visit Farmers Market Self Storage on 111 The Grove Drive here in Los Angeles, between Beverly and 3rd.

We have one of the newest, cleanest, and sharpest facilities around. Seriously. Our property was custom-built from the ground up to be the best storage solution on the market. We just finished the construction on 270 additional storage spaces to better serve the needs of the community. 5x5's, 5x10's, 10x10's, and more now available to rent!

Check us out online http://www.FarmersMarketSelfStorage.com

Our spaces have individual unit alarms, tall ceilings, access for moving trucks, 24-hour digitally recorded video surveillance, a free truck with move-in (if renting 10x10 or larger, based on availability), and an on-site staff 7-days a week devoted to making your storage experience smooth.

Let me tell you about our property!

When it comes to safe, convenient, and affordable self-storage in Los Angeles, Farmers Market Self Storage can always be counted upon to be the best choice.

Located at the Farmers Market and The Grove retail complex; we pride ourselves in offering the best amenities and services our customers deserve! We have parking for you here in our garage, so you don't need to worry about paying for parking while you tour our facility.

Yelper's say:
"I've been renting a unit from Farmers Market Self Storage for almost 2 years, and it has been a terrific experience for me. It is super clean, easy to get to your unit, and the guys that work there are so nice and friendly. Not only that, they go above and beyond to help you out, and make sure everything is as easy as possible."

"It feels brand new. Very very clean . Very clean halls, elevators, and my space seemed clean. There are excellent security systems in place. I've never seen a storage facility like this."

"Are all storage units this clean and staffed so nice?! I'm so pleasantly surprised by their helpfulness, free truck to move in, and one month intro rate."

"This is clearly the Cadillac of storage facilities... I can't imagine any other places have better service, cleanliness and overall facilities."

Managed by our esteemed team of professionals, our state-of-the-art facility offers a variety of storage solutions to accommodate all your storage needs.

Come pay us a visit and receive peace of mind knowing all your stored belongings are protected under 24 hour video surveillance, personalized key pad entry, and individually alarmed units. We have a helpful staff on site seven days a week to assist with any storage related needs.

Check this out: We've also just completed construction on a solar panel array that will power an estimated 90% of our entire facility. Our state-of-the-art facility fully supports any initiative to "Go Green", manage a lower-impact facility, and more environmentally-positive business.

We also have a wide selection of packing and moving supplies at some of the best deals around.

Check us out online at http://www.FarmersMarketSelfStorage.com for details!

Read some of our stellar reviews on Yelp by following this link (don't forget to view filtered results!): http://www.yelp.com/biz/farmers-market-self-storage-los-angeles#query:storage

Our rental office is open Mon-Sat from 8:30am-6:00pm and Sundays from 8:30am-5:00pm.

Give us a call at show contact info with any questions.

Proudly serving all of Los Angeles including: Hollywood, West Hollywood, Beverly Hills, Melrose, La Brea, Wilshire, Miracle Mile, and Koreatown, and so much more.

Farmers Market Self Storage is your one-stop shop for all your self-storage needs!

Have an excellent day!

Not all apartment communities are created equal. To stand out in a highly competitive field, there are two factors a successful community needs to focus on. First, they need to offer amenities that, quite simply, you can't live without. Second, the community needs to be located somewhere desirable. So what makes Valley Street Apartments special?

When you come home to Valley St. Apartments, you'll enjoy a place that's designed with comfort, convenience, and functionality in mind. Assigned parking spaces means that the days of endlessly hunting for a place to park are over. You'll see that hardwood flooring and a suite of kitchen appliances allow you to experience the convenience and comfort of modern living. Our fitness center lets you stay active no matter the weather, and on-site laundry facilities reduce the annoyance of that one chore.

You'll find us between the popular neighborhoods of Echo Park and Silver Lake. Our community offers many parks, shopping options, historic Los Angeles landmarks, and so much more. And with access to the wider world through easy freeway access and convenient commuter rail stations, exploring your new neighborhood has never been easier.

Maybe this sounds perfect for you and your family and you're ready to join us, making here your next home. If so, you'll want to act fast, because our apartments won't last long and demand is high. Contact us online or by phone today.
